TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowSubscriptionService extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides methods for a subscription service to manage subscriptions for a workflow runtime.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
WorkflowSubscriptionService is the base class for any subscription service classes used in the Workflow Foundation (WF).
